title: Set Up a Usability Test
description: A UX researcher wants to run a remote usability test for a new website feature.

tasks.description: Define the tasks for the user to complete during the test (e.g., 'Find the contact page and send a message').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear list of tasks.

tasks.description: Recruit 5-7 participants who match the target audience persona.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds suitable participants for the test.

tasks.description: Set up the test in a remote usability testing platform, including the tasks and any follow-up questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully configures the test in the software.
